entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: King City North 11:00 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

Humidity: 91 %

Air Quality Health Index: 4

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Periods of rain beginning before morning. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Temperature steady near 6. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 7. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
